title: Manohari Kanthi Haaram - Exquisite Diamond and Gemstone Necklace
materials: Hyderabadi Polish for a lustrous finish.
features: Delicate filigree work surrounding each CZ stone creates a floral effect. The pendant features a central square-cut ruby surrounded by CZ and flanked by emerald teardrops. Traditional peacock (Mayura - మయూర) motifs are subtly incorporated in the pendant design. Dangling gold beads add a touch of traditional charm. The necklace portion is a beautifully linked chain with floral CZ accents.
colors: and lush green (emerald). The combination symbolizes prosperity and good fortune in South Indian culture.
occasions: festive occasions like Diwali and Sankranti
or as a statement piece for a special evening. A modern interpretation of a classic
suitable for the contemporary bride or the fashion-forward woman.
description: This Haaram blends traditional Telugu jewelry elements with modern design sensibilities. The high-quality CZ stones provide a dazzling sparkle, while the genuine ruby and emerald add a touch of luxury. The Hyderabadi polish ensures long-lasting shine and durability. A timeless piece that can be passed down as an heirloom.
